prompt: My son enters kindergarten soon, I plan to get caught up on my scrapbooking! Years behind I am!

prompt: I was very angry when I was fired from my job July 23rd.

prompt: My wife and I having been saving all year and finally are going on vacation next month. This will be our first vacation together.
